website_summaries.verdict: A solid day-bed option designed with a matching trundle.
pros: Can be ordered in white or bronze
Trundle is not hooked to the bed and can be rolled to another part of the room or under a different bed
cons: Since this is a metal bed, you will likely need extra protection for your floor
Metal heads on the screws will show after assembly

customer_reviews.title: Glad then sad:  STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.text: At first, we were very happy with the purchase. The bed looks great. But after three months there are significant structural issues with the frame, the frame integrity on our bed is sub-par. The bed was used by a preteen with no rough play and sometime over the three months of ownership the frame is compromised severely. We are hoping for a positive outcome with customer service, will update review when resolution is determined. Update: No action will be taken. No replacement or refund offered. Three months is the apparent life span of this product. Update 2: Seller has now initiated a replacement with the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: NOT A GOOD BED FOR IN-LAWS!
customer_reviews.text: If you are searching for a day bed for your in-laws, do not purchase this one. I tried to buy a cheap frame that would squeak all night and sag, but I didn't hear one complaint! "We got a wonderful night's sleep!" "How much did you guys spend on this quality piece of craftsmanship?!" Ugh. Thanks a lot, Dorel Home Furnishings, for producing a bed that my wife's mother thinks would be better than staying at a hotel out in town...
customer_reviews.author: rawdawg

customer_reviews.title: Bought this bed originally loved it it was purchased for a three year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed originally loved it it was purchased for a three year old and in under six months the entire side panel just popped apart. Called customer service to inquire about replacing the panel but was informed that there's no replacement after the first 30 days. They had no information for the manufacturer no address or telephone number so now I'm just out of my money. I'm very disappointed because I actually really like this bed but now it's unusable because they're sharp metal sticking out of the bed... buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: a alf

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this daybed.
customer_reviews.text: Package left on my porch was banged up, ripped in several places and held together with tape. The posts were just thrown in the box- I don't even know if they were all there. The daybed itself was bent and broken. The welding looked cheap and unsafe. No trundle. I returned it and bought something else. Don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: LMM

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy, not squeeky and wobbly like many metal beds ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this bed for my son, who wanted to downsize from a queen bed, so he could have room for a desk and other stuff in his room. He is an almost 6-ft. tall, 260 lb. boy, very big kid, and he fits in the bed, but if he grows two more inches, he probably won't, lol! It is very sturdy, not squeeky and wobbly like many metal beds are. Not sure on the trundle yet, as it hasn't been tried out, but everything seems to be of good, solid quality. The 16-year old put it together himself, so not too complicated, although he is good at that type of thing. So far, pretty satisfied overall with this bed.
customer_reviews.author: srenaudTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The entire underside is now in the garbage and all we have is a headboard and footboard
customer_reviews.text: After about one year of normal use, the metal support bar underneath the bed has bent and nearly broke in two. The entire underside is now in the garbage and all we have is a headboard and footboard. We will now have to purchase a new under frame and hope it fits the headboard. Disappointed. Would definitely not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: arleneyp

customer_reviews.title: Other than the color the daybed is nice but took some time for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Bed IS NOT WHITE as stated in description and on box. Bed is an ecru, off white color. Very disappointing as I had planned the whole room around white. Other than the color the daybed is nice but took some time for assembly. Had my husband not spent so much time assembling it before I got home and saw it and realized the description was completely inaccurate, I would have been sending it back. Do not buy this unless you do not want true white. You have to tear the box up to get it out so once you do, you will have no way to return it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: This bed has exceeded my expectations. Still waiting on the delivery of the twin mattress for the trundle but it only took me a couple hours to put it together and not fully tightening the pieces until it was all put together helped immensely. I saw some people having issues with things not lining up and that wasn’t the case for me. Everything fit perfectly together and is really sturdy. Now I just need to put some bedding on it and spruce it up. The full size with twin trundle is a perfect solution for someone needing to save space in a small room but not wanting to only have a twin bed for guests. Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our guest room.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. We purchased this for our guest room. It took me about 2 hours to assemble this daybed, but that was because I assembled it myself. I recommend assembling this daybed with a partner to cut down the time. The trundle is perfect. It has wheels which you can lock. I tested it and the daybed holds me and my husband. We have a combined weight of 350 pounds. For the trundle, I feel that it's more sturdier than the full. My son is 106 pounds and he said the trundle was very comfortable. We tested it, and we approved! I know my guests will love them too.
customer_reviews.author: PAULA

customer_reviews.title: Great value, beautiful bed frame!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great value for a beautiful bed frame! I've had it for just about a year now and it's held up beautifully so far. I have a double sized bed, and I feel like this bed frame might be better suited for a queen size - when my mattress is perfectly centered on the slats, it's fine, but when it's pushed to either side, there's a gap between the edge of the mattress and the bed. As for construction, my bed frame came with detailed instructions that made setting it up a breeze. I probably completed putting the whole thing together in an hour or less. The pieces themselves look nice, too! I would highly recommend this bed frame!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Lane

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS DAYBED!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS DAYBED! I ordered it ( $100 cheaper than Kmart!) for my back room. partially disabled its now more convenient for me to sleep in my back tv/comp room than climbing stairs -- I wasnt sure how much weight it would hold but lets say between me, the mattress and sometimes 2 dogs, way over 300# ! it is very study, nothing cheap in this product. I love the trundle, not only for my dogs to sleep on next to me, but my older girl uses it to hop up onto the high daybed! def. recommend this one for anyone wanting a nice looking sturdy product!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bed for a low cost
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bed for a low cost. Had no issues while assembling this product. I had help from my 8 year old sister, so it was pretty easy. 5/5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Rebecafranco

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to surprise my kiddo while they're away at their grandparents' for school break. This frame is fantastic. Took me a couple hours but the directions were straight forward and all i needed help with was getting the box up my stairs. It's sturdy, feels well-made, and was delivered by Amazon Logistics who took care in delivering it and gently placed it on my porch. I'm so impressed. Very happy i purchased this, and im sure my child will be happy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Not making it that easy. 😂
customer_reviews.text: So this is a funny story. I bought this bed for my son to sleep on when he is home visiting from college. So him and his girlfriend that I absolutely love 💕 they have know each other since 6th grade (just like me and hubby) come to visit for Christmas and says hey the trundle doesn’t pop up so we can sleep together. Score for mom!!!! The bed is very comfy and very sturdy because my baby is a big boy💕💕💕💕 Alyson Robichaux
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Great and sturdy bed frame and awesome customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: We read the reviews before we bought this frame and the reviews had mostly positive remarks. The bed is sturdy and an adult can definitely sleep on it. Assembly took about an hour and a half but assembly was not difficult. Also, I had a very positive experience with this company's customer service department. Thank you so much for your prompt response and handling my inquiry in a very professional in customer service friendly manner.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Some hardware doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: Trying to assemble this trundle and some hardware doesn’t even fit. Called the manufacturer, they said they mailed the missing hardware. After a week still waiting for it. In the picture showing the hardware 2 and 3 but there’s no hardware one. Tried to use the extra but it doesn’t fit. Showing in the video, I was trying to use the extra hardware. Hopefully if they send hardware #1 will work. So far, not happy with it because I have guess coming in 2 days and this daybed is not ready.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: I wrote one earlier and said they didn't send the hardware to put it together. I contacted the seller and they shipped it out. Got the stuff about a week later. The bed was easily put together and feels secure. Great bed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Sobolik

customer_reviews.title: Guest will be sleeping in style!!!
customer_reviews.text: Searched for the longest for a full sized daybed with a trundle and this one just kept sticking out... after reading the reviews I figured I'd purchase it... SO GLAD I did!! I needed it for our guest room and It's just what I wanted/needed and it was easy to put together!! (Did it by myself!! My husband was shocked!) it arrived super fast and everything was intact!! It's sturdy and comfortable... will definitely buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Darkeysa Townsel

customer_reviews.title: I love my bed
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bed!!!!! It was easy to put together and didn’t take long. The only thing I wish is that it was a little taller. You can adjust the height but even the tallest isn’t very tall to me, but my previous bed was pretty tall. But overall I love this bed! It’s pretty and sturdy. I’ve had it a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: In love with this QUEEN daybed!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bed. It’s perfect for making the most of limited space and a queen bed. It’s easy to put together alone, but you need two people to move the box. (It does take some time to put together, 1 1/2-2hrs, since there are many smaller parts to assemble). This bed was worth every penny and every second to me!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki B

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bed!
customer_reviews.text: Had a slight issue with one of the pieces missing, but got on the website that was a little weird and emailed the issue. They sent the correct part and all was well. The bed is great and sturdy. Don’t fear if you have issues- they really do check their site and will get you any parts you need!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a king size and I am very happy with my purchase. The box it came in was obviously huge and heavy, and a little bit damaged but the bed frame was in perfect condition. My husband was able to take it upstairs and put it together completely by himself. He says it wasnt too awful, just took a little time. Its sturdy and quiet as a mouse. I am able to fit smaller storage boxes underneath it, so I do love that. I definitely reccomend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Cheekydizzle

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for a great price! Has hold up well for two years of heavy use!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed nearly two years ago. I was initially impressed with the bed, but wanted to hold off a little while til it got some use before I posted a review. I forgot all about it until I came online to order another one. We LOVE this bed. My girls are 9 and 11 and have been using this bed since Dec 2017 (it’s Aug 2019) with zero complaints. My kids are rough and jump and bounce and do all kinds of things that I tell them not to. The bed is still holding strong with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Creaky
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bed for three years. And I do still love the look of it. but, I know everytime my cat or nine year old climb on my bed. my kids know every time I roll over from the room beneath mine. this sucker creaks a lot. very attractive, bed but, be aware it is noisy. i'm sick of the noise level with it and am hunting for a new bed for me and giving this one to my teenager. again not too upset, it only cost 160 dollars where as similar looking beds that don't creak at least as much cost upwards of five hundred at an actual furniture store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fragile, Not Sturdy, Bent and Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Awful quality. The first time I got them out of the box, I was so surprise at how light and hallow they frame felt, but I figured I’d give it a try and started to assemble it. Assembly was not hard but then one of the rails on the bed was already bent, which cause it to not fit into the hole of the other frame correctly. Useless! The slats seemed really fragile too and had some cheap plastic snap-ons to keep them in place. Everything felt so fragile and hallow in this bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Sinette M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Most of the time, you get what you pay for... and this is priced low. However, it fit the bill and surpassed our expectations. This bed is being used in our home as a guest bed, so I cannot comment on long-time durability but it feels extremely solid. Since it's a platform bed, no box spring is needed (saves more money!) The finish of the bronze is matte and won't show scratches/knicks easily. It's exactly as pictured, was relatively easy to assemble in about 30 minutes (if you just read and follow the directions.) We couldn't be happier with the product!
customer_reviews.author: ScarletSwitchit

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this bed
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this bed. We just got it and it took my husband and I about an hour to put it together. We did use the instructions but they were pretty easy to follow. It looks beautiful in our farm house style home. Love the bronze color, it is like a dark brown, looks kind of antique. I am using a box spring and it's still very low to the floor. It is sturdy feeling and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: All parts were labeled and directions were easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised with the quality and look of this daybed for the price. All parts were labeled and directions were easy to follow. My husband had it together and looking great in about one and a half hours. The bed is very well constructed and is exactly what we wanted for our extra bedroom - it's looks great - the trundle is solid and well made also and slides easily from under the bed. I will caution to make sure you look at the specs because it is good sized and we had to rearrange the room to make it fit - but it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Donovan1

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this bed is a great value. It's sturdier than I thought it would be, assembled easily and looks pretty good. Not sure I would recommend this for someone over 125 lbs or so. It works perfect for my 6 year old though and at under $200 for the bed and trundle, you cant beat that with a stick.
customer_reviews.author: tinak

customer_reviews.title: Guest daybed
customer_reviews.text: I received the bed yesterday. Built it today. The bed is really pretty. It was really easy to build it took be and my daughter 45 minutes to do. I do think the bed frame is very flimsy. I normally read reviews before i purchase anything, but really liked it and needed soon for my guest room. I just hope it lasts more than 3 month like someone had said in their review. If not the price is to high for the quality. I will try to do an update after it's been used. All in all its really nice and only good if it won't be used too often.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this bed. Awful
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Started out great and over time [three months] it started to make a terrible noise. As if it’s going to just fall apart every time you move. Very disappointed!! Do not buy this bed. You will be buying a replacement in a few months. Cheap and crappy!
customer_reviews.author: Suburban Family

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This turned out beautiful for my little girl! It was hard finding a daybed to fit a full size mattress that we liked. I had read mixed reviews but this turned out better than I thought! So easy to put together and extra material “just in case” was so nice to have! It looks beautiful, is very sturdy, and most importantly she loves it! The twin tru doe is perfect for sleepover nights with her friends!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Huff

customer_reviews.title: Great guest bed
customer_reviews.text: Not a daily sleeper and no storage but a great guest bed that was easy to assemble and works well for when all our kids visit. the trundle stores under the day bed making our room more accessible when stored and pulls out for sleeping for visitors. Sturdy but does not get daily use in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Myers

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bed, but it SQUEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my daughter's room. It went together very easily and is sturdy. I'm completely happy with the look of this bed. HOWEVER, the bed squeaks something fierce! As in, it's very difficult for my daughter to sleep as it wakes her up throughout the night. I thought it would be something she would learn to sleep through and to some extent she has, but it still wakes her up. We are going to replace the bed. It's a shame, because we are very happy with it otherwise. She loves the daybed aspect and the trundle underneath has been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Solid wrought iron. If you are a female by yourself be warned that if they deliver it while you are out this sucka is HEAVY! Took my Father-in-Law (Ex) about 3 hours to put together by himself. It takes up quite a bit of space. I was in between purchasing a queen with a trundle twin bed but couldn't find one so I opted on this one. It would be a fine addition to any guest room. I also purchased the Linenspa mattress for the trundle bed below. It came fairly quickly but just be aware it is heavy. Respectfully Reviewed
customer_reviews.author: Psboston7

customer_reviews.title: only because each bar has 4 peices to make connections sturdy. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very solid frame. About 2 hours to assemble, only because each bar has 4 peices to make connections sturdy. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: cheaper quality, but works for now
customer_reviews.text: *Update* Bed only lasted 4 months before the bars underneath the bed broke. Super cheap quality (March) (Nov bought) The bed was relatively easy to put together, took some time. As far as durability, it's an iffy. The bottom legs that are the supports, don't look that stable. I'm hoping that they don't break anytime soon. The bed itself looks nice when all put together. It's a cheaper item I'd consider as far as bed frames go. I probably wouldn't buy it again, after knowing what I know now. I'd just spend more money and get a better quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Zia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but replacements are expensive
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself was nice. It isn’t the sturdiest or quietest as it is a thin metal. But it was pretty when setup. However, I feel I should bring awareness that if you lose the bolts, it is $53.40 for a pack of bolts. Just don’t lost your parts or need a replacement after 1 year warranty. I unfortunately moved and lost the screws to the bed itself. That does not include the bolts for the trundle. I would hate to know what it would cost for a bar heaven forbid one breaks during a move. Just beware!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This happens to fit perfectly into the dirmer window area of my Victorian house. I had purchased one a few years ago, and was pleased to see that it was still available for the former window in the other room. These are both guest bedrooms, and the beds will primarily be used by my grandkids. They are not super strong, nor are they built like antique furniture, but they're a great value for the price. I love having a trundle bed out of the way yet available when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was no problem, except for my assistant (my cat) that took a couple of naps right where I needed to work. I used a chair to hold up the sides when it was time to put everything together. I like the rustic appearance of my choice. Only possible BIG issue for some is that all four ball posts, did not screw in securely. Not sure if is user assembly error (me) or the product. But, I haven't had the need to look into it so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: nardfran

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!!! Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I am pleasantly surprised by this bed. Usually metal beds are pretty flimsy. And while there were a lot of pieces it was very easy to put it together and understand the directions. Did not take that long. This bed seems to be very sturdy and very well put together. Even sleeps adults just fine. I highly recommend this bed to anyone looking for an affordable bed. I especially love the fact that it is a full mattress on top and twin on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Frame bent on day 33 - NOT sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We had been using this as a couch and bed for daily use. It was delivered 5/7/18 and assembled very easily. No complaints on assembly or instructions. My return window ended 6/7/18. The frame bent substantially on 6/10/18, literally 3 days after my return window ended. Big ol' v-shaped bend right front and center, just like in cartoons. I guess I saw the other reviews about the frame bending and I thought "well, look at all the other happy customers, that won't possibly happen to me". Oops.
customer_reviews.author: mrs. barrett

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Awful purchase and experience with manufacturer. Headboard bent and cracked and won’t line up with side to attach. Called manufacturer to replace headboard and the side pole. Sent photos and then heard nothing back. Called again and they said they don’t have replacement parts for that and they would offer me $25. Horrible! I have all the pieces out of the box and some parts assembled , now to get a whole new one I have to send this one back somehow....don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.author: caroline jilek

customer_reviews.title: The Trundle is crap!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bed and trundle , a little over a year ago. Bed is holding up fine.Tundle on the other hand about 4 months into it wheels started to become very loose, the child sleeping on it was only 80 pds.At 7 mths of having wheels started coming off after moving into a carpeted room with the same child on it, kinda forgot about the 1yr warranty that part is on me .But regardless there's no way those wheels were made to hold up to a 225pd person at all.
customer_reviews.author: The Potato Lord

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous,classic, affordable
customer_reviews.text: This gold twin trundle is gorgeous. Simple and classic for my boys who are transitioning from toddler beds. They share a small space so this was a great option. People have complained about the welding of the metal but ours was perfectly packed in tight boxes and no bent up rods upon arrival. All pieces were accounted for along with the trundle. The gold is more of a light brown. But when the sun shines down on it, the metal becomes a brushed gold. It’s beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: The RUB

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is the only pain (edited)
customer_reviews.text: This bed is sturdy and looks beautiful for the price I believe it was a great buys It’s not the easiest to assemble it will take some effort but it’s worth every penny. It has held up well and feels sturdy I was afraid it might be flimsy but it turned out great. I used the zinus twin mattress 6inch and looks good feels good . Would recommend Edit 12/16/2019 Took two stars away , Do not recommend this bed after a year of using its incredibly noisy and annoying it sucks because I can’t buy another one. So still using this I give it 3 stars because it’s a pretty frame but not practical.
customer_reviews.author: Mjones

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: Great bed especially for the price! I didn't get gray fasteners for bottom trundle though, of course I haven't contacted company yet...but overall it's really nice! Note: Finish is textured, some of the screws are exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Razberriez

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is an awesome bed for a child or teenager. It's sturdy, doesn't squeak and the trunde is very simple to use. Our 11 year-old girl loves it, especially when friends spend the night. We're very happy with this purchase! (We put an 8" memory foam mattress on the bed, and a simple 6" foam mattress on the trundle as to not weigh it down too much).
customer_reviews.author: Average busy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy a nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my guest room, mainly used by my Grand Children. I love the bed, it looks nice and once build is very solid. When you build the bed make sure you read through all the instructions first before starting, there are a few steps that would of been good to know earlier. It took me about 3 hours to assemble, it turned out great though.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and time consuming installation
customer_reviews.text: Easy and time consuming installation, not bad for the price. There are some design flaws like they use the plastic clips to hold between each pipes in the seat frame which makes noise and scared of being broke. I bought a twin size spring mattresses to make less pressure on the small pipes in the seating frame. It would have been nice if they provide a lengthy frame in the middle to balance the weight evenly. Overall is a decent purchase..
customer_reviews.author: nandhu

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this bed today for mt daughter's room. Had it assembled, bed made and everything in an hour (2 people for frame, one for slats) I read a previous review about the plastic clips that worried me a bit, but they're just there to keep the slats locked in and I had no problem with them. I had to force the the first two slats a little bit on either end to get them locked, but once they were in, the rest was a breeze. The bed looks absolutely adorable for a child's room, now we'll have to see how it holds up to a wild child 5 year old. I will update after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: This bed sturdiness is what we expected. The instructions were difficult to work out. We recommend assembly with two people. The part "O" which is the support bars were difficult to get locked in. We had to assemble them apart from the connected frame on one side and lock, then tighten the side together. We put the trundle together first and gave you awareness on how to assemble the larger bed.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA CARDINAL

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and easy but not made for box springs (asthetically)
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful inexpensive bed frame and incredibly easy to assemble. Directions are very clear. Had it done in an hour. HOWEVER if you have a mattress that requires a box spring this is not the bed frame you want. Frame essentially is lost behind the height of mattress and box spring combo
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Got this set a year ago for my 5 and 3 year old. The frame came a little dented in some places. And a year later, the bed slats are bending. My kids are only 40 lbs so there shouldn't be any issue with weight capacity. You get what you pay for. And I will say that the roller wheels on the trundle are GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Suinedor

customer_reviews.title: Assembly a Breeze
customer_reviews.text: REVIEW OF ASSEMBLY ONLY. Bought this for my son's room for when he comes home for a short stay while on leave from the military. Package arrived with no issues. All parts and pieces accounted for and undamaged. Frames are easy to put together with allen wrench screws. However it seems the screws were just a bit bigger than the 4mm allen wrenched I have in my tool box and although they provided you with 2 allen wrenches, one of them was just a touch too big. Once put together, the bed seems pretty durable, but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: squeaky for STILL worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed a couple of months ago and i love it! I sleep on the top bed and I have a 3 year old that sleeps on the trundle. I bought 2 memory foam mattresses and the bed is perfect. I have an 8" on the top and a 6" for the trundle bed and there is no issue what so ever, If there was anything I would change about it it would be the squeaking that has just started happening. Also its a little bit of a paid to get on and off when my baby is sleeping on the bottom bed the extra space I have now that I switched to this bed, is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Beware Bed Knobs
customer_reviews.text: To be clear, we are satisfied with the sturdiness, construction, and overall functionality of the bed - why the low star rating? The end cap bed-knobs are not sturdy at all and were already stripped simply from assembly. This is not an issue of assembly error. The bed knobs were defective. Currently, they’re attached, crooked, and wobbly making the whole bed look quite poorly made. We are very unhappy, but what were we to do? The bed knobs were the LAST step. Disassembling the bed and returning it is not worth our time.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Beckham

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice; very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bed works really well in my apartment. It takes awhile to put it together - the slats are tricky - but the instructions are really clear, and every part is labeled. Highly appreciated in these days of Coronavirus when we had no one to come in and help us with this project. Note I bought an Avocado mattress to use with it, and the whole setup is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed!!
customer_reviews.text: I put this bed together - by myself, age 64 - in just over an hour! Very easy to assemble! Extremely sturdy & very attractive! My granddaughters love the trundle feature! I HIGHLY recommend this bed to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G. Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For The Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, particularly for the price. Looks good, sturdy and doesn't take up too much space; fits our needs perfectly! You need to pay attention when putting the trundle together, though. My husband put the frame of the trundle together then tried to put the slats into the frame, the frame was slightly too small for the slats to fit in-curious, but workable. Hubby took the frame apart, placed 2 washers into the front part of the frame and 1 washer into the back of the frame-on both sides. This gave him just enough room to fit the slats in perfectly. We really like this product and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Designed well, excellent bed !!
customer_reviews.text: The box was damaged when it got here though nothing inside was hurt..excellent packaging. All parts were labeled, screws came with wrenches in plastic with extra screws..amazing. The metal is well powder coated..beautiful. Construction was straight forward, leave screws a little loose until all together then tighten..I cut a piece of cardboard to length for placing the snap ons...This unit was designed well and thought out well..what else can I say..
customer_reviews.author: Nik Danko

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I assembled this bed in about 2 hours; from unboxing to laying on top of our mattress. All of the tools needed are included. After reading other reviews I added Teflon tape to all of the screws. This will keep them from backing out or squeaking. The instructions were clear and essay to follow. The bed provides excellent support for our mattress. We collectively weigh about 450lbs.
customer_reviews.author: houseofanaya

customer_reviews.title: impressed--easy build, solid quality, styling
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to replace a bunk bed in our child's room and this was easy to set up in an hour with wife and child , seems to be solid quality and looks good and the trundle is a win for guests...
customer_reviews.author: CSL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'10" and I need a full sized bed for me and twin for my 11 year old son. This bed has been great. I was scared about assembling it myself but the instruction they provide were very clear and easy to follow. This is a GREAT bed and I would recommend it to anyone considering purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this bed. It’s sturdy- it’s held up for almost a year now even with a teenaged boy sleeping on it! My husband said it was easy to assemble too. Great product, would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn*G

customer_reviews.title: Great Beds
customer_reviews.text: Got two for my daughters bed and they are so easy to put together. Great quality. And perfect for children and teens. Would not recommend for adults, since it won’t endure heavy weights for a long period of time. Parents have used it when visiting but that’s it. And having the trundle bed is super handy for when people visit and need an extra bed.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine  Berry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bed
customer_reviews.text: Got this awesome beautiful bed for our two kids but our younger son isn’t ready for a big bed yet so as of right now so the bottom is a great sleeping spot for our sons dog while our older son sleeps on the top bed. Super easy to set up, really easy follow along directions, bottom pullout rolls very easy isn’t hard for me to get out at all with the bed fully made (no pillow though). Delivered fast and in perfect condition would definitely recommend buying this! My boys love it, I love it, YOULL LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Mize

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable bed
customer_reviews.text: Bed was not too difficult to assemble, but a second (or third) person definitely is necessary in my opinion! You can choose between 2 heights; I opted for the higher option and therefore no longer need a bedspring. I've only used it one night so far, but it feels completely sturdy and I love the look. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: B McCartney

customer_reviews.title: Great value - sturdy, simple, clean bed
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the look of this bed - very simple and clean. Easy to assemble, I put it together myself. I ordered the king, and it's very structurally sound! Not much noise or shifting during movement. GREAT value for the price! Shipping was also very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good sleep!
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t bought the mattresses yet! I put a couple of doubled then a sleeping bag on the bed for my Sweetheart (also my husband of 58 yrs) to take a nap this afternoon. He slept for about two hours. When he waked up I asked if he slept well. His response was “o yes I slept like a log!” I think that says it all. We’re very pleased with our purchase. M
customer_reviews.author: Little Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great look and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! Lots of peices but easy to assemble and doesn't take as long as it looks. I did it alone in an hour or less. Best space saving, room-for-activity bed for when our nieces and nephew visit! With the bed pushed all the way to the wall the trundle bed fits well underneath but the wheels stick out too much for my liking as its used for a kids room. I'm going to have to cover them with noodles or something. I was sent the wrong color initially but easily replaced and had ups pickup the wrong order.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Damaged at factory.
customer_reviews.text: We bought a bunk bed with a lower full size bed and upper twin, from Amazon. The bed went together perfectly, and is solid as a rock. But I had trouble making the top bunk. We thought this would be perfect for guests who have kids. The bed came damaged (part of the metal was crushed) with sharp edges that would have been an issue. It was damaged in the factory, not in shipping. It was in a very, very heavy box, and I felt bad for the delivery guy. It really should be in two boxes. Amazon was great about returning the bed. I wish it had worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Belding

customer_reviews.title: Adorable BUT not sturdy at all, definitely not gonna last!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is adorable BUT so squeaky and wobbly for only used by a 3 year old so far. We’ve had it for just a week or two now and I know it’s not gonna last. Bummer! Also the knobs on the corners are so loose and won’t even screw in straight, the piece that they screw into is crooked and one is actually broken so it just hangs loose. :(
customer_reviews.author: KZambranny

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice bed, but the set up is confusing
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bed, but the set up is confusing. We had a few mis-shaped bars in the box and it's too much work to take apart and ship back. Not all the bars easily insert into the Frame. I'd rather cross my fingers and hope it stays put than to take it all apart. It's very time consuming both ways. I would not purchase this same bed again. I'd rather look for something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for my son as a birthday gift. He was in a loft bed and needed a larger bed. This has been very sturdy and he loves it. We’re very happy with the quality and looks great in his room. We’re happy about having an “extra” bed with the trundle bed underneath. There’s some storage accessible in front of the trundle which has been nice for small bins with toys that can easily be accessed and moved when we need to use the twin bed.
customer_reviews.author: Tegan Edgington

customer_reviews.title: Well made and attractive
customer_reviews.text: The bed arrived on time. Hubby put it together in a couple hours with a small bit of help from me. Package arrived with no dings on the box. All parts were there. All parts were flawless. It's solid and very pretty. It's in my large bonus/sewing room to be used for occasional guests. We put an 8" mattress on the top, leaving the trundle without a mattress for the time being which is great for storing large flat items (quilting rulers, etc.) and a spare set of sheets.
customer_reviews.author: ECS66

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Great packaging!! All Amazon sellers should stop using styrofoam like this seller has! Everything arrived safe and complete. Love the bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Parts are labeled wonderfully. Directions are easy to understand and pretty much idiot proof. Took about an hour to unpack and assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly O

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged, but DHP’s Customer Service was outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Update Upon receiving my complaint, the company immediately contacted me to address my concerns. I simply verified the damage and purchase information, and within days received a new part to replace the damaged one. Thank you so much, Alma from DHP! Upon opening the box, the right side (t) was bent, rendering the frame useless and unstable. Unfortunately, I opened it 3 days after the return window closed. Otherwise, a very attractive bed.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new bed. She's very excited for sleepovers to happen again in the future! It was very easy to put together. Took about 30 minutes with the help of two others. It would have taken longer alone but I'm confident it would have been easy as well. It's a gorgeous bed at a great price. I highly recommend this bed!
customer_reviews.author: KC Austin

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for a guest room. It’s beautiful. It’s more of a muted gold and isn’t shiny yellow, which I love. It seems sturdy and doesn’t squeak when you lay on it. You can also adjust the frame to different heights, depending on how far off the ground you want the mattress. On the highest level you can easily store things under the bed with what I’d estimate to be about 1 foot of clearance.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Matney

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: the package arrived at the house in a box with a bent rail taped to the front of the box. I figured it was just one rail so no big. I got this form my 5 year old daughter and the occasional sleep overs with my 5 year old nice as well. It was a great price and pretty easy to assemble. I did it on my own in about 2 hours. I would recommend this bed and tunnel if you need something that'll hold up for a kid. I don't know how comfortable Id feel to have an older teen or young adult using this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Henry

customer_reviews.title: Its an OK bed for the product
customer_reviews.text: It took 3 hours to put this together and it took 2 weeks to get the delivery. The head side frame had bad screw holes. They were not properly aligned and too small for the screw to go in. Had to make adjustments with hammer and drill machine. Doesn’t look that strong but lets see how long it’ll last.
customer_reviews.author: Ati

customer_reviews.title: Great for your money
customer_reviews.text: Great for your money! Took several hours to assemble completely but finish product looks amazing an important note, inside the instructions it didn’t explain what one of the pieces to build was, it’s to hold the slats in place so they don’t squeak ! Some of the construction was frustrating and had to realign bolts several times to fit, but besides that super easy to put together just time consuming. I paid 194 dollars for this and paid for a 5 year warranty just in case after seeing one of the reviews with a broken main support beam . I believe it’ll hold up well though, have yet to try it out
customer_reviews.author: Jessieboo

customer_reviews.title: Good bed for the price
customer_reviews.text: The metal was damaged when we received the bed, from the looks of it from the delivery company not during assembly. DHP replaced the pieces without fuss after we submitted the paperwork and pictures. My daughter picked out the bed herself online and has enjoyed sleeping in it. Her friends sleep on the trundle on a real mattress that's 8" thick. I like that the trundle holds a thick mattress with coils and padding - not a flimsy 6" mattress. The metal is thin and light weight but it's held up well in the 4 months she's slept on it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put the bed together by myself. The instructions were easy to follow, and all the parts were there and in good shape. It looks good in the bedroom. It seems sturdy, and it doesn't seem to squeak or creak. I'm satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for the DHP Manila Metal Framed Daybed with Trundle, Twin - White
customer_reviews.text: It arrived early this morning and within a couple of hours it qas together, please note we didn't just put it together during that time, we had breakfast and was watching tv so that's what made it a few hours long process. It was pretty darn easy to assemble and came out just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: NMesarch

customer_reviews.title: VERY SQUEAKY
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Not too hard to assemble but directions could have been clearer. Problem is it’s SOOOO SQUEAKY! My daughter weighs 90lbs and every time she rolls over I can hear it from our room down the hall. I’ve tried tightening it, oiling it.... nothing has helped. It was actually waking her up so we are now looking to get rid of it and get a new one. It started squeaking after a month or so...
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: First, these were an absolute pain to assemble. After they were together, they seemed to be decent beds until we had to disassemble it when we moved just a few months later. The metal near the screws bent, several screws stripped ridiculously easy making it impossible to remove. We now have two pretty beds assembled with zip ties.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Perry

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made bed. Comes in a lot of pieces. Hired an Amazon pick to put it together and he had it put together in about an hour. Very professional as well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Conley

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking bed and luckily I am handy with tools. Break out your own allen wrenches because the tiny little allen wrench supplied is a waste of time. I was able to figure out how to put this together - had some help from a You Tube video. There were absolutely no instructions anywhere in the box. Even Ikea gives you pictures. If you don't like putting puzzles together, don't get this daybed. There are a million pieces. It's for my grandkids, it won't get a huge amount of use so hopefully it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny May

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy, easy to assemble bed
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this is titled as upholstered, it is a metal frame bed. But it was very easy to assemble and is super sturdy. The slats are metal and are secured in with clips. It’s a decent height and has two height options depending on your preference. Great bed, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: BEST BED FRAME EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I've gone through quite a few bed frames and this one by far is the best one yet. It's better than I expected. Very well made and easy to put together but you're going to need help when it comes to doing the slats it took my daughter and I 2 hours last night to get them in but in the end it was worth it....I have a well made beautiful bed. I have yet to put the twin trundle together...will today but now I know what to do differently, put the slats in the frame first then attach everything else. I also appreciate it the fact the trundle was included well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Does the job nicely
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and she loves having a couch bed. Trundle works well with the mattress we had already but they are not pillow tops, so far no problems except slight bending of trundle mattress bars but piece of study cardboard or thin hard board will rectify that so keep your packing boxes.
customer_reviews.author: brenbrit58

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this product maybe 8 months and we had problems with the emu level legs. After getting on the bed it would slope to one side now the center bar has completely fallen off and left scratch marks all on my wood floors. This is a terrible bed I’m so disappointed I wasted money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cornish

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were pretty easy to follow, though I wish the screws had their number label on the packaging instead of just the key in the instructions. Bed seems sturdy so far, which is expected given the number of supports you put together! My biggest complaint is that the box it is shipped in is NOT suitable for shipping. As you can see in the first picture it got knocked around and messed up part of the frame. The box was ripped and lopsided when received. Also, there was some discoloration on some parts or patchy paint. Bottom line: Good product for the price, but don’t expect too much.
customer_reviews.author: wearenotamused

customer_reviews.title: Missing MANY pieces.
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived missing MANY important pieces (legs for the headboard and one of the side rails, just to name a couple of the missing pieces). I tried putting together some of the parts that did arrive, and discovered that some of them they wouldn't fit--holes were off just enough that screws wouldn't go in when pieces were fit together. What a major disappointment, especially because I was planning on having this new bed set up in the guest room in time for the holidays. Buy something else and save yourself a lot of headache.
customer_reviews.author: Rural Girl

customer_reviews.title: Stylist Daybed with Trundle for guest room
customer_reviews.text: This Daybed with Trundle worked perfectly for a small guest room. It is very sturdy and fit together very well. All the screw holes lined up. I was surprised by how clear the instructions were (probably the best I have ever seen from a product imported from China). There are plenty of cross braces to support a regular mattress. We choose to buy a hybrid mattress (LinenSpa 8" Memory Foam and Innerspring Hybrid Mattress) on Amazon. We were very pleased with the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sparty

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Took bit more than 1 hour. But liked it. The top one privided with picture might be broken easy even though i have tightened. But other way it is good day and trundle bed.
customer_reviews.author: Tsogbayar Dulamsuren

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece! Simple, clean, perfect fit for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad to assemble (single mom. Did it myself!). Some parts seem wonky but made them all fit. Not the greatest quality but perfect for my office / spare bedroom. And for when my kids have friends sleepover with the trundle option! Other reviews suggested a 6in mattress for trundle. There is plenty of space. Wish I had got an 8in mattress for more comfort. All in all. Happy purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jdf1234

product_meta.title: DHP Manila Twin Metal Daybed Frame and Twin Size Trundle, Gold
product_meta.description: Style:Daybed and Trundle| Size:Twin| Color:GoldDo you need extra sleeping space? Do your kids love sleepovers? Then this Manila daybed with handy pull-out trundle is perfect for your home. The linear Victorian design with rounded finials gives any room a spark of style that’s both modern and timeless. Choose from white, bronze, gold or millennial pink finish to suit your décor and add a touch of sophistication to any room. The simple yet elegant metal frame is sturdy and comes with metal slats for extra support and ensures air moves freely around your mattress to keep it fresh for years to come. Your kids can read, play and sit back by day, then sleep soundly on the daybed when it’s time for lights out. For overnight guests, just pull out the trundle, which is mounted on four easy-glide casters. All you need are some pillows and throw blankets for color, and you’re all set!
feature_bullets: Victorian design with classic finial detailing
Multi-functional piece ideal for small living spaces and accommodating guests
Support and durability from a sturdy metal frame, 20 slats for daybed and 22 slats for trundle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,414 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
